Business Travel

  • Corporate Rate Package
  • Area Businesses
  • Group Travel Request

A NYC Boutique Hotel Suited For Business

Located in the Heart of the Flatiron District

Business travelers will enjoy the prime location and many extra amenities that The Evelyn hotel has to offer. From free Wi-Fi to a wide range of concierge services, our New York boutique hotel is optimally suited for the needs of today's business travelers. Located in New York's NoMad District near many global business headquarters, The Evelyn combines the efficiency and comfort of a New York City business hotel with boutique accommodations that reflect the character of the neighborhood and offer an authentic taste of Manhattan.

Business Amenities At Our Boutique  New York City Hotel

  • Free Wi-Fi
  • Proximity to many area businesses
  • Access to 24 Hr. Fitness
  • Concierge services
  • Valet parking available with surcharges
  • Bellman
  • Luggage Storage
  • Telephone with voicemail
